tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE ScenarioAnalysis (
    scenario_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    economic_condition VARCHAR(255),
    financial_outcome DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE financial_outcomes (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    outcome_date DATE,
    outcome_amount DECIMAL,
    scenario_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (scenario_id) REFERENCES scenario_analysis(id)
);

CREATE TABLE ScenarioAnalysis (
 scenario_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 economic_condition VARCHAR(50),
 impact_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE FinancialOutcomes (
 outcome_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 scenario_id UUID REFERENCES ScenarioAnalysis(scenario_id),
 financial_metric VARCHAR(50),
 value DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE EconomicConditions (
 condition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 condition_name VARCHAR(50),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Metrics (
 metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 metric_name VARCHAR(50),
 description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AnalysisResults (
 result_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 scenario_id UUID REFERENCES ScenarioAnalysis(scenario_id),
 outcome_id UUID REFERENCES FinancialOutcomes(outcome_id),
 metric_id UUID REFERENCES Metrics(metric_id),
 result_value DECIMAL
)
